description: The TabStopFormat class represents the properties of a tab stop in a paragraph. You can set the TextLayoutFormat.tabstops property to an array of TabStopFormat objects.

members.description: Returns an ITabStopFormat instance with all properties set to undefined.
Return the value of the style specified by the styleProp parameter which specifies the style name. accessed. Returns undefined if the style is not set.

values: styleProp The name of the style whose value is to be retrieved.
The value of the specified style.  The type varies depending on the type of the style being

members.description: Set the value of the style specified by the styleProp parameter which specifies the style name to value.

values: styleProp The name of the style whose value is to be set.

members.description:
The position of the tab stop, in pixels, relative to the start edge of the column.

Legal values are numbers from 0 to 10000 and FormatValue.INHERIT.

Default value is undefined indicating not set.

If undefined during the cascade this property will have a value of 0.

values: RangeError when set value is not within range for this property

members.description:
The tab alignment for this tab stop.

Legal values are TabAlignment.START, TabAlignment.CENTER, TabAlignment.END, TabAlignment.DECIMAL, FormatValue.INHERIT.

Default value is undefined indicating not set.

If undefined during the cascade this property will have a value of TabAlignment.START.

values: RangeError when set value is not within range for this property

members.description:
The alignment token to be used if the alignment is DECIMAL.

Default value is undefined indicating not set.

If undefined during the cascade this property will have a value of null.

values: RangeError when set value is not within range for this property

members.description: Creates a new TabStopFormat object. All settings are empty or, optionally, are initialized from the supplied initialValues object.

values: initialValues optional instance from which to copy initial values.

members.description: Copies TabStopFormat settings from the values ITabStopFormat instance into this TabStopFormat object. If values is null, this TabStopFormat object is initialized with undefined values for all properties.

values: values optional instance from which to copy values.

members.description: Concatenates the values of properties in the incoming ITabStopFormat instance with the values of this TabStopFormat object. In this (the receiving) TabStopFormat object, properties whose values are FormatValue.INHERIT, and inheriting properties whose values are undefined will get new values from the incoming object. Non-inheriting properties whose values are undefined will get their default values. All other property values will remain unmodified.

values: incoming instance from which values are concatenated.

members.description: Concatenates the values of properties in the incoming ITabStopFormat instance with the values of this TabStopFormat object. In this (the receiving) TabStopFormat object, properties whose values are FormatValue.INHERIT, and inheriting properties whose values are undefined will get new values from the incoming object. All other property values will remain unmodified.

values: incoming instance from which values are concatenated.

members.description: Replaces property values in this TabStopFormat object with the values of properties that are set in the incoming ITabStopFormat instance. Properties that are undefined in the incoming ITabStopFormat instance are not changed in this object.

values: incoming instance whose property values are applied to this TabStopFormat object.

members.description: Compares properties in ITabStopFormat instance p1 with properties in ITabStopFormat instance p2 and returns true if all properties match.

values: true if all properties match, false otherwise.

members.description: Sets properties in this TabStopFormat object to undefined if they match those in the incoming ITabStopFormat instance.

values: incoming instance against which to compare this TabStopFormat object's property values.

members.description: Sets properties in this TabStopFormat object to undefined if they do not match those in the incoming ITabStopFormat instance.

values: incoming instance against which to compare this TabStopFormat object's property values.

members.description: Returns a TabStopFormat object with default settings. This function always returns the same object.

values: a singleton instance of ITabStopFormat that is populated with default values.
